maqras.text: 26|1|ta, seen, meem.
26|2|ye prakaashamay pustak kee aayaten hain.
26|3|sambhavatah, aap apana praan[1] kho dene vaale hain ki ve eemaan laane vaale nahin hain
26|4|yadi ham chaahen, to utaar den unapar aakaash se aisee nishaanee ki unakee gardanen usake aage jhukee kee jhukee rah jaayen[1].
26|5|aur nahin aatee hai unake paalanahaar, ati dayaavaan kee or se koee naee shiksha, parantu ve usase mukh pherane vaale ban jaate hain.
26|6|to unhonne jhuthala diya! ab unake paas sheeghr hee usakee soochanaen aa jaayengee, jisaka upahaas ve kar rahe the.
26|7|aur kya unhonne dharatee kee or nahin dekha ki hamane usamen ugaee hain, bahut-see pratyek prakaar kee achchhee vanaspatiyaan
26|8|nishchay hee, isamen badee nishaanee (lakshan)[1] hai. phir unamen adhiktar eemaan laane vaale nahin hain.
26|9|tatha vaastav mein, aapaka paalanahaar hee prabhutvashaalee, ati dayaavaan hai.
26|10|(unhen us samay kee katha sunao) jab pukaara aapake paalanahaar ne moosa ko ki jao atyaachaaree jaati[1] ke paas
26|11|firaun kee jaati ke paas, kya ve darate nahin
26|12|usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! vaastav mein, mujhe bhay hai ki ve mujhe jhuthala denge.
26|13|aur sankuchit ho raha hai mera seena aur nahin chal rahee hai meree zubaan, atah vahî€¼yee bhej de haaroon kee or (bhee).
26|14|aur unaka mujhapar ek aparaadh bhee hai. atah, main darata hoon ki ve mujhe maar daalenge.
26|15|allaah ne kahaah kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. tum donon hamaaree nishaaniyaan lekar jao, ham tumhaare saath sunane[1] vaale hain.
26|16|to tum donon jao aur kaho ki ham vishv ke paalanahaar ke bheje hue (rasool) hain.
26|17|ki too hamaare saath banee israeel ko jaane de.
26|18|(firaun ne) kahaah kya hamane tera paalan nahin kiya hai, apane yahaan baalyavastha mein aur too (nahin) raha hai, hamamen apanee aayu ke kaee varsh
26|19|aur too kar gaya vah kaary,[1] jo kiya aur too krtaghanon mein se hai
26|20|(moosa ne) kahaah mainne aisa us samay kar diya, jabaki main anajaan tha.
26|21|phir main tumase bhaag gaya, jab tumase bhay hua. phir pradaan kar diya mujhe, mere paalanahaar ne tatvadarshita aur mujhe bana diya rasoolon mein se.
26|22|aur ye koee upakaar hai, jo too mujhe jata raha hai ki toone daas bana liya hai, israeel ke putron ko.
26|23|firaun ne kahaah vishv ka paalanahaar kya hai
26|24|(moosa ne) kahaah aakaashon tatha dharatee aur usaka paalanahaar, jo kuchh donon ke beech hai, yadi tum vishvaas rakhane vaale ho.
26|25|usane unase kaha, jo usake aas-paas theh kya tum sun nahin rahe ho
26|26|(musa ne) kahaah tumhaara paalanahaar tatha tumhaare poorvojon ka paalanahaar hai.
26|27|(firaun ne) kahaah vaastav mein, tumhaara rasool, jo tumhaaree or bheja gaya hai, paagal hai.
26|28|(moosa ne) kahaah vah, poorv tatha pashchim tatha donon ke madhy jo kuchh hai, sabaka paalanahaar hai.
26|29|(firaun ne) kahaah yadi toone koee poojy bana liya mere atirikt, to tujhe bandiyon mein kar doonga.
26|30|(moosa ne) kahaah kya yadyapi main le aaoon tere paas ek khulee cheez
26|31|usane kahaah too use le aa, yadi sachcha hai.
26|32|phir usane apanee laathee phenk dee, to akasmaat vah ek pratyaksh ajagar ban gayee.
26|33|tatha apana haath nikaala, to akasmaat vah ujjval tha, dekhane vaalon ke lie.
26|34|usane apane pramukhon se kaha, jo usake paas theh vaastav mein, ye to bada daksh jaadoogar hai.
26|35|ye chaahata hai ki tumhen, tumhaaree dharatee se nikaal[1] de, apane jaadoo ke bal se, to ab tum kya aadesh dete ho
26|36|sabane kahaah avasar (samay) do moosa aur usake bhaee (ke vishay) ko aur bhej do nagaron mein ekatr karane vaalon ko.
26|37|ve tumhaare paas pratyek bade daksh jaadoogar ko laayen.
26|38|to ekatr kar lie gaye jaadoogar ek nishchit din ke samay ke lie.
26|39|tatha logon se kaha gaya ki kya tum ekatr hone vaale[1] ho
26|40|taaki ham peechhe chalen jaadoogaron ke yadi vahee prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) ho jaayen.
26|41|aur jab jaadoogar aaye, to firaun se kahaah kya hamen kuchh puraskaar milega, yadi ham hee prabhutvashaalee honge
26|42|usane kahaah haan! aur tum us samay (mere) sameepavartiyon mein ho jaoge.
26|43|moosa ne unase kahaah phenko, jo kuchh tum phenkane vaale ho.
26|44|to unhonne phenk dee upanee rassiyaan tatha apanee laathiyaan tatha kahaah firaun ke prabhutv kee shapath! ham hee avashy prabhutvashaalee (vijayee) honge.
26|45|ab moosa ne phenk dee apanee laathee, to tatkshan vah nigalane lagee (use), jo jhooth ve bana rahe the.
26|46|to gir gaye sabhee jaadoogar[1] sajda karate hue.
26|47|aur sabane kah diyaah ham vishv ke paalanahaar par eemaan laaye.
26|48|moosa tatha haaroon ke paalanahaar par.

26|49|(firaun ne) kahaah tum usaka vishvaas kar baithe, isase pahale ki main tumhen aagya doon? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara bada (guroo) hai, jisane tumhen jaadoo sikhaaya hai, to tumhen sheeghr gyaan ho jaayega, main avashy tumhaare haathon tatha pairon ko vipareet disha[1] se kaat doonga tatha tum sabhee ko phaansee de doonga
26|50|sabane kahaah koee chinta nahin, hamato apane paalanahaar heekee or phirakar jaane vaale hain.
26|51|ham aasha rakhate hain ki kshama kar dega, hamaare lie, hamaara paalanahaar, hamaare paapon ko, kyonki ham sabase pahale eemaan laane vaale hain.
